page.title: 10Grant's Distillery-Girvan
page.content:
Grant's produce both malt and blended whisky, but as Girvan's distillery is a lowland one the whisky all goes to be blended with others. It is one of the most automated distilleries in Europe and employs about 200 people on an 84 acre site. Girvan was chosen as the site for Grant's new distillery in 1963 because: 1.The water was of god quality 2.There were adequate road and rail links 3.There was flat building land 4.Unemployment was high in Girvan
Now Girvan produces grain whisky at a rate of 2,500,000 proof gallons per year from maize imported from America.
